{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Monoprice |model=8070 |revision= |upc=844660080701 |ean= |asin=B005MGAM64 |price= |est_release_date=09/2011 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Winstars |manuf_model=WS-WN513N2 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196C |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=ESMT |fla1_model=F25L16PA |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L128168A-6T |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192CE |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Wireless-N |default_ssid_regex=^Wireless-N$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:23:13 |oui_eth=00:23:13 }} ''Wireless 802.11N Router w/ WPS & WISP Function (300Mbps)''
[http://www.monoprice.com/products/product_print.asp?c_id=105&cp_id=10501&cs_id=1050108&p_id=8071 Printable product page on Monoprice] The model of this unit is MS-WN513N2. The device is a '''Winstars''' WS-WN513N2. "WS-WN513N1/2-V3.1" is silkscreened on the board. The power adapter included with the unit is a WT0501000 (5V, 1A). ==Images== ===From Monoprice=== File:Monoprice 8070 front.jpg|front File:Monoprice 8070 ports.jpg|ports File:Monoprice 8070 back.jpg|back File:Monoprice 8070 box.jpg|box File:Monoprice 8071 power supply.jpg|power adapter, same as 8071 [[Has images::packaging| ]] ===From [[User:M86|m86]]=== File:Monoprice 8070 board top.jpg|board top File:Monoprice 8070 board bot.jpg|board bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] File:Monoprice 8070 top.jpg|unit top File:Monoprice 8070 bottom.jpg|unit bottom [[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]] __NOTOC__
